explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses credit scoring models, which are a common application of machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on classification tasks (good vs. bad credit customers), which is a supervised learning problem.
explanations.classification: The main goal of the paper is to classify credit applicants into good or bad credit categories.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares the proposed method with SVM as one of the baseline models.
explanations.SVM: Same as support vector machine - listed as one of the comparison methods.
explanations.decision tree: The paper compares the proposed method with decision tree (DT) and CART as baseline models.
explanations.neural network: The paper compares the proposed method with ANN (Artificial Neural Network) as one of the baseline models.
